definition.title: What Makes a Game a "Hidden Gem"?
definition.explanation: These titles were crowded out by same‑week blockbusters, microscopic print runs, or zero Western marketing—yet they're among the most underrated gba games today.

tips.title: Buying & Preservation Tips
items: Check Save Batteries – Many GBA carts use CR1616 cells; replace for ~$3.
Hunt Japanese Auctions – Yen softness means cheaper boxed editions.
Dump Your ROMs – A GBxCart RW backs up saves for future generations.
